rules: Rule1: Under the condition that a region has an alternative material, then if the job requires training for a skill, the job does not require that skill.
Rule2: Either a region has an alternative material or a region has an alternative job.

Rule3: In the event that it is false that either a region implements policy legislation or, if the region has an alternative job then provided that the job requires training for a skill the job does not require that skill, then the policy legislation is successful.

Rule4: If it is not the case that either a region implements policy legislation or, when the region has an alternative job then if the job requires training for a skill the job does not require that skill, then the policy legislation does not achieve success.
Rule5: Provided that it is not true that if it is false that when a region uses a material then the region has legislation then the legislation bans the material, then the job requires skill.

Rule6: Under the condition that it is not the case that should it be false that if a region uses a material then the region has legislation then the legislation bans the material, then the job requires training for the skill.

Rule7: If it is not the case that should it be false that if it is not true that whenever a region uses a material then the region has legislation then the legislation bans the material then the job does not require skill, then the region has an available job.

Rule8: Provided that it is not true that if it is not the case that under the condition that it is false that if a region uses a material then the region has legislation then the legislation bans the material then the job does not require skill, then the region does not have an available job.
Rule9: If the legislation does not receive government approval, then the region uses the material.
Rule10: Whenever the legislation is not government approved, then it is not the case that the region has legislation.
facts: Fact1: It is not the case that the legislation bans the material.
Fact2: The region does not implement the policy legislation.
